postgres.description: Direct database queries and schema inspection

playwright.description: Browser automation for E2E testing (enable when needed)

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'rm -rf|DROP TABLE|DELETE FROM.*WHERE 1|truncate'; then echo 'BLOCK: Dangerous command detected'; exit 1; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'npm install|pnpm install|yarn add'; then echo 'Reminder: Restart dev server after installing dependencies'; fi

filepath=$(echo "$ARGUMENTS" | grep -oE 'src/components/[^"]+\.tsx' || true); if [ -n "$filepath" ] && [ -f "$filepath" ]; then echo 'Warning: Component file already exists. Confirm before overwriting.'; fi
if echo "$ARGUMENTS" | grep -qE '"status":\s*"completed"'; then echo 'Reminder: Consider updating CLAUDE.md if you made significant changes'; fi
